name: Mr. Clean
description: I'm mr. clean and I am a fourth year computer science major, minoring in cleaning services. In my free time I like to wash toilets and from time to time I'll film some commercials. Since this is my final year, I really want to make some friends and make this final year the best one.

name: Michael Scott
description: You know what they say. 'Fool me once, strike one, but fool me twice...strike three.'
